title: Can't start a game
body: Ok so i was playing fine all night last night and then turned my pc on this morning to play and cant get a game to start. get through champ select then i get error saying application error or something like that not letting me even get to champ loading screen i tried two separate games before i reinstalled game and its still happening. Im on that stupid leaver penalty for a mistake in your client

replies.body: This error might actually be a connection issue with your network failing to reach the game server.  When champion select ends you transition to the game, so it's totally independent from the client.  You should go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, and test it in a custom to prevent further [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  I hope that helps!

well after i got your reply my game started working again and now nothing has changed and boom back to not connecting application error i have perfect connection firewall doesnt block so now what do i do
Your connection seems unstable, so you'll still want to go over the connection issues guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know the results!
